name: Escape of Mari: The Polar Ladybug
name_original: Escape of Mari: The Polar Ladybug
description:
Mari is a ladybug and she needs you to escape from the polar lands. Control her with a mouse, she goes wherever you click left or right button. Touching any walls, stones or spiders kills you instantly. The game is difficult but fair thanks to a significant amount of checkpoints. You can collect in-game gold coins to unlock more levels!

Features

  • precise mouse control
  • fast-paced thrilling experience
  • you can skate on ice
  • you play as a ladybug
  • great for speedrunning
